gating.warningIntro: Your country ({country}) may have restrictions on crypto trading or token sales. Please review the information below and acknowledge to proceed.

bullets.info: This site is for informational purposes only and does not constitute financial advice.
bullets.restrictions: Participation may be restricted or prohibited in your jurisdiction.
bullets.continue: By continuing, you confirm you understand the risks and local regulations.

gating.blockedBody: Access to this content is not available in your jurisdiction ({country}). We cannot provide token sale or trading information in your location due to regulatory restrictions.

warningCountryNotes.US: Crypto services are strictly regulated in the United States (SEC, CFTC, FinCEN). By continuing, you acknowledge compliance is your own responsibility.
warningCountryNotes.IN: Crypto trading in India is subject to heavy taxation and unclear regulations. Proceed only if you understand the local laws.
warningCountryNotes.VN: Vietnam prohibits crypto as legal tender, but trading is widely used. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.TH: Thailand has regulated crypto exchanges; ensure compliance with SEC Thailand.
warningCountryNotes.TR: Turkey restricts use of crypto for payments. Trading remains allowed under regulation.
warningCountryNotes.NG: Nigeria has restrictions on banks handling crypto, but P2P trading is common. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.UA: Crypto is legal in Ukraine, but under evolving regulations. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.RS: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.BG: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.HU: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.CZ: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.SK: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.SI: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.
warningCountryNotes.PL: Crypto is permitted but regulated under EU or local law. Continue at your own risk.

blockedCountryNotes.RU: Due to international sanctions, access from Russia is restricted. Trading is not available.
blockedCountryNotes.CN: Crypto trading and exchanges are banned in mainland China. Access denied.
blockedCountryNotes.BD: Crypto trading is prohibited by law in Bangladesh.
blockedCountryNotes.NP: Crypto trading is prohibited in Nepal.
blockedCountryNotes.BO: Crypto trading is prohibited in Bolivia.
blockedCountryNotes.DZ: Crypto trading is prohibited in Algeria.
blockedCountryNotes.MA: Crypto trading is prohibited in Morocco.
blockedCountryNotes.QA: Crypto trading is prohibited in Qatar.
blockedCountryNotes.EG: Crypto trading is prohibited in Egypt.

seo.title: $REKT - Only losers win

tax.title: {percentage}% Tax on Every Buy/Sell
tax.burnCapDescription: Once 200M  have been burned, burning will stop permanently. 50% will go to the treasury, and 50% will go to staking to encourage long-term growth.

phase1.title: Launch & Foundation
phase1.goal: Fair launch, instant staking, lean & meme-ready setup.

items.dashboard: Dashboard: REKT Score Leaderboard, Vesting Tracker, Staking Reward, Burn Cap.
items.autoStaking: Auto Staking For All Presale Tokens, Start Earning From Day One.
items.lossClaim: Loss Claim V1 (Only For Presale Investors From  Transaction, 1 Claim Per Wallet, On-Chain Verified).

phase2.title: Utility & REKT Logic
phase2.goal: Activate tokenomics, engage stakers, drive on-chain volume.

items.dexTax: 1% Dex Tax: 50% Staking, 25% Treasury, And 25% Burn (Until 200M Burned).
items.rageClaim: Rage Claim Penalties Scale Over Time (20% -> 5%).
items.lossClaimV2: Loss Claim V2: Wallet Age Multiplies, Cooldowns.
items.burnTracker: Burn Cap Tracker + Live Staking Stats.
items.nftDrop: Optional NFT Drop To Refill Staking Pool.

sellAfterLaunch.question: Can I sell everything after launch?
sellAfterLaunch.answer: 30% unlocks at launch, the rest vests over 6 months. Want more early? Rage claim but expect a burn penalty.

rewardsOnLocked.question: Do I earn rewards on locked tokens?
rewardsOnLocked.answer: Yes! All presale tokens are automatically staked and earning rewards from day one.

afterBurnCap.question: What happens after the burn cap?
afterBurnCap.answer: Once 200M tokens are burned, the burn mechanism stops. Tax distribution shifts to 50% treasury, 50% staking.

lossClaimsSupported.question: Which tokens can I use for Loss Claims?
lossClaimsSupported.answer: Any verified loss from DeFi protocols, CEX liquidations, or rug pulls can be claimed with proper verification.

stakeAfterPresale.question: Can I stake if I buy after the presale?
stakeAfterPresale.answer: Absolutely! Staking is available to all  holders, not just presale participants.

claimAmount.question: How much REKT can I claim from losses?
claimAmount.answer: Claims are calculated based on verified loss amount, wallet age, and community tier multipliers.

description.after: 參與質押 — 這是一次性的機會。
